Title: LRO LOLA Color Hillshade 128ppd, Endurance-A Site A
Abstract: 这是原始LOLA数字高程模型（DEM）版本4的彩色阴影浮雕，裁剪到Endurance-a站点a的50x50公里区域。DEM是基于LOLA仪器截至2011年9月获得的测高数据，分辨率为128像素/度的月球形状图（半径）。地面轨迹是使用Generic Mapping Tools程序surface和grdblend进行插值的。该地图采用二进制表的形式，每0.007813度纬度有一行，像素注册。地图值指的是1737400米的半径。
Projection:
PROJCS['ESRI PE String = COMPD_CS[unknown,PROJCS[Site_A_ortho,
	GEOGCS[GCS_Moon_2000,
		DATUM[D_Moon_2000,SPHEROID[Moon_2000_IAU_IAG,1737400.0,0.0]],
		PRIMEM[Reference_Meridian,0.0],UNIT[Degree,0.0174532925199433]],
	PROJECTION[Orthographic],
	PARAMETER[False_Easting,0.0],
	PARAMETER[False_Northing,0.0],
	PARAMETER[Longitude_Of_Center,161.05104],
	PARAMETER[Latitude_Of_Center,-59.12448],UNIT[Meter,1.0]],VERTCS[EGM96_Geoid,V
		DATUM[EGM96_Geoid,AUTHORITY[EPSG,5171]],
	PARAMETER[Vertical_Shift,0.0,AUTH',
	GEOGCS['GCS_Moon_2000',
		DATUM['D_Moon_2000',SPHEROID['Moon_2000_IAU_IAG',1737400,0]],
		PRIMEM['Reference_Meridian',0],UNIT['degree',0.0174532925199433]],
	PROJECTION['Orthographic'],
	PARAMETER['latitude_of_origin',-59.12448],
	PARAMETER['central_meridian',161.05104],
	PARAMETER['false_easting',0],
	PARAMETER['false_northing',0],UNIT['metre',1,AUTHORITY['EPSG','9001']]]
